summary: This bill, the "No User Fees for Gun Owners Act," prohibits states and local governments from imposing liability insurance, taxes, or user fees as a condition for owning or engaging in commerce involving firearms and ammunition. It amends both Title 18 of the United States Code and the Internal Revenue Code to reflect these restrictions. The bill allows for the application of general sales taxes to firearms and ammunition, provided they are applied proportionally to other goods and services.
